Generation III.Ruby: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this Pok é mon eats.
Generation III.Sapphire: Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times. The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious substance that is not of this earth.
Generation III.Emerald: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.
Generation III.FireRed: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.
